alert.note: Alert for Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 12:30AM MDT until June 13 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dewey County in north central South Dakota... * Until 100 AM MDT. * At 1229 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bear Creek, or 9 miles north of Lantry, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Green Grass around 1240 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include White Horse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
